issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: TiAPI: Review and clean up platform bugs and reduce bug count by 20%.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
{html}

While manually managing the views array in a scrollableView I can successfully remove a video player view but the video / audio continues to play. Here's a code example.

http://pastie.org/1515560

Related HD ticket (that expands much broader than just this one issue): http://developer.appcelerator.com/helpdesk/view/64751

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: ScrollableView continues to play video

comments.body: Code doesn't seem to work (the simulator is stuck at the splash screen) and the HD link doesn't seem to work either..
Cannot reproduce described issue in SDK 2.2.0.014b86f.
